Description: Identify 10-20 prior art references for Telemetry-Aware DPO and Human-in-the-loop Alignment. Create a novelty matrix.
Acceptance Criteria: CSV of prior art + Novelty Matrix MD delivered.

Description: Define the architecture for connecting Telemetry to Alignment Trainer and the Human Review API.
Define the OpenAPI/GRPC contract for the Human Review Service.
Create a simulation harness for generating synthetic telemetry events with known faults.
Implement a baseline DPO training script using standard datasets (no telemetry).
Implement the `TelemetryConnector` module to ingest logs from `server/src/telemetry`.
Acceptance Criteria: Module consumes logs and normalizes them.

Description: Implement logic to convert normalized telemetry + human feedback into DPO preference pairs.
Acceptance Criteria: Unit tests passing for preference generation.

Description: Implement the backend service for human review of escalated cases.
Draft 2 independent and 8 dependent claims for the Self-Correcting Telemetry Protocol.
Draft the commercial brief and ROI narrative for Alignment-as-a-Service.
Generate SBOM and document PII handling for preference data.
Acceptance Criteria: SBOM and Governance MD files committed.

Description: Create a demo script showing the full loop: Telemetry -> Flag -> Human -> Train -> Update.
